TopicTitle: Game fails to install from zip or installer

Articles.Content:
Hi!

I previously had KSP installed but with all the updates and my outdated mods, I decided to do a fresh install.

I uninstalled KSP via Windows' normal uninstall programs procedure, then restarted my computer.

When I try to install the game via the installer or the zip file (v 0.25), I get errors. I tried redownloading the files and doing it again, but I get the same errors (but with different file names).

Here are screenshots of the errors: http://imgur.com/a/mRYa9

Please help me get off the launch pad!!

You may need to attempt downloading with a different browser or possibly a download manager. With some less reliable internet connections, the connection to KSP's servers may be severed before you finish the download. If you have Firefox, I'd recommend getting the DownThemAll! extension and trying to download via that.

You may need to attempt downloading with a different browser or possibly a download manager. With some less reliable internet connections, the connection to KSP's servers may be severed before you finish the download. If you have Firefox, I'd recommend getting the DownThemAll! extension and trying to download via that.

Good idea, thanks!! In sure chrome has something similar.
I downloaded it again and it worked. Thanks!
